trans-unit.source: Suppresses reporting of a specific static analysis tool rule violation, allowing multiple suppressions on a single code artifact.
trans-unit.target: 取消报告特定静态分析工具规则违规，并允许多次取消单个代码项目。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be applied to any application element.
trans-unit.target: 此特性可以应用于任何应用程序元素。

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of the violations that can be suppressed, see [Code Analysis for Managed Code Warnings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c2741ff-0d3a-42e6-acd5-d42310bd03c4).
trans-unit.target: 可以抑制冲突的完整列表，请参阅[为托管代码警告的代码分析](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c2741ff-0d3a-42e6-acd5-d42310bd03c4)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.ConditionalAttribute> is applied to this class, specifying the preprocessing symbol "CODE_ANALYSIS" as the conditional symbol that determines whether the attribute call is included or omitted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.ConditionalAttribute>应用于此类，指定预处理符号"CODE_ANALYSIS"作为条件确定是包含还是省略属性调用的符号。

trans-unit.source: If the symbol is defined, the attribute call is included; otherwise, the call is omitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义了该符号，则属性将包括调用;否则，调用被省略。

trans-unit.source: When you right-click a Code Analysis warning in the Visual Studio **Error List** and then click **Suppress Message(s)**, a **SuppressMessage** attribute is added either in your code or to the project's global suppressions file.
trans-unit.target: 当您右键单击 Visual Studio 中的代码分析警告**错误列表**，然后单击**禁止显示消息**、 **SuppressMessage**属性会被添加在你的代码或项目的全局禁止显示文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the **SuppressMessage** attribute and its use in Visual Studio, see [In Source Suppression Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f1a2dc6a-a9eb-408c-9078-2571e57d207d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息**SuppressMessage**属性和其使用在 Visual Studio 中，请参阅[中源抑制概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f1a2dc6a-a9eb-408c-9078-2571e57d207d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute> attribute to suppress performance warning messages.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了利用<xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute>特性禁止显示性能警告消息。

trans-unit.source: The category for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 该属性的类别。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the analysis tool rule the attribute applies to.
trans-unit.target: 应用该属性的分析工具规则的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute" /> class, specifying the category of the static analysis tool and the identifier for an analysis rule.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute" /> 类的新实例，同时指定静态分析工具的类别和分析规则的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The `category` parameter value is specific to the analysis tool and categorizes the rule identified by the `checkId` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `category`参数值是特定于分析工具，由标识的规则进行分类`checkId`参数。

trans-unit.source: The two parameters concatenated together form a unique identifier for the rule.
trans-unit.target: 两个参数串联而成窗体规则的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: The preprocessor symbol "CODE_ANALYSIS" must be defined for this attribute to be effective.
trans-unit.target: 预处理器符号"CODE_ANALYSIS"必须为此属性是有效定义。

trans-unit.source: The absence of the preprocessor symbol results in the attribute not being applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定不应用的属性中的预处理器符号结果。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute> attribute to suppress warnings for the `Microsoft.Performance` category and the `CA1801` and `CA1804` check identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了利用<xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute>特性来禁止显示的警告`Microsoft.Performance`类别和`CA1801`和`CA1804`检查标识符。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the category identifying the classification of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 获取标识特性分类的类别。

trans-unit.source: The category identifying the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 标识特性的类别。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute.Category%2A> property describes the tool or tool analysis category for which a message suppression attribute applies.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute.Category%2A>属性描述的工具或消息禁止显示属性适用的工具分析类别。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute> attribute to suppress warnings for the `Microsoft.Performance` category and the `CA1801` and `CA1804` check identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了利用<xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute>特性来禁止显示的警告`Microsoft.Performance`类别和`CA1801`和`CA1804`检查标识符。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of the static analysis tool rule to be suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取要取消的静态分析工具规则的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the static analysis tool rule to be suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 要取消的静态分析工具规则的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Concatenated together, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute.Category%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute.CheckId%2A> properties form a unique check identifier.
trans-unit.target: 连接在一起，<xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute.Category%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute.CheckId%2A>属性构成唯一检查标识符。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute> attribute to suppress warnings for the `Microsoft.Performance` category and the `CA1801` and `CA1804` check identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了利用<xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute>特性来禁止显示的警告`Microsoft.Performance`类别和`CA1801`和`CA1804`检查标识符。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the justification for suppressing the code analysis message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于取消代码分析消息的规则。

trans-unit.source: The justification for suppressing the message.
trans-unit.target: 用于取消消息的规则。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an optional argument expanding on exclusion criteria.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置扩展排除条件的可选参数。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the expanded exclusion criteria.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含扩展的排除条件的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute.MessageId%2A> property is an optional argument that specifies additional exclusion where the literal metadata target is not sufficiently precise.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute.MessageId%2A>属性是可选的参数，指定其他排除不足够精确文本的元数据目标。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute> cannot be applied within a method, and it may be desirable to suppress a violation against a statement in the method that will give a rule violation, but not against all statements in the method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute>不应用在方法中，并可能需要禁止显示冲突针对将违反规则时，该方法中的语句，但无法防范方法中的所有语句。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute> attribute to suppress warnings for a specific parameter in a method declaration and a specific field in the method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了利用<xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute>来禁止显示警告的方法声明中的特定参数和方法中的特定字段的属性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scope of the code that is relevant for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与属性相关的代码的范围。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the code that is relevant for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 与属性相关的代码的范围。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute.Scope%2A> property is an optional argument that specifies the metadata scope for which the attribute is relevant.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute.Scope%2A>属性是可选的参数指定该属性的相关元数据范围。

trans-unit.source: Possible values for managed metadata include "member", "resource", "module", "type", "method", or "namespace".
trans-unit.target: 托管的元数据的可能值包括"成员"、"资源"、"模块"、"类型"、"方法"或"命名空间"。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a fully qualified path that represents the target of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示属性目标的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: A fully qualified path that represents the target of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 表示属性目标的完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute.Target%2A> property is an optional argument identifying the analysis target of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute.Target%2A>属性是可选参数，它标识分析目标的属性。

trans-unit.source: An example value is "System.IO.Stream.ctor():System.Void".
trans-unit.target: 一个示例值是"System.IO.Stream.ctor （):System.Void"。

trans-unit.source: Because it is fully qualified, it can be long, particularly for targets such as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 因为它是完全限定的它可以长，特别是对于如参数的目标。

trans-unit.source: The analysis tool user interface should be capable of automatically formatting the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 分析工具用户界面应该能够自动设置参数的格式。
